chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
items.plainText: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.

items.text: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
items.plainText: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.

items.text: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
items.plainText: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.

items.text: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.
items.plainText: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.

items.text: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.
items.plainText: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.

items.text: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.
items.plainText: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.

items.text: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:
items.plainText: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:

items.text: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapour; stormy wind fulfilling his word:
items.plainText: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapour; stormy wind fulfilling his word:

items.text: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:
items.plainText: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:

items.text: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:
items.plainText: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:

items.text: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:
items.plainText: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:

items.text: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:
items.plainText: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:

items.text: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
items.plainText: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.

items.text: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
